comment.content: That's amazing stuff...^^ You've done a lot of work. After I read(If I can finish it..^^;;) I will leave comment if I have any commet.

comment.author: KB
comment.content: Fantastic! Will feedback during the weekend. Also I would be finishing an initial version of database install/uninstall scripts by then.

post.content:
Hi, all.

I loaded the first draft of test cases on wikispace under the link "Test Plan". The document is not complete but I need some feedback before I finish it.

Please feel free to comment, especially on following items:

1. Are test cases detail enough?
2. Is each test case valid ?
3. Are there any cases missing?
4. Is the language and format used in the document clear and concise?
5. Some of the less clear items are underlined on the document. Please feel free to confirm/comment on any of them.

Thanks,

S. Suh Lee
post.title: Test Cases for Watir Script (draft) is loaded
